repos_data.description: KitchenOwl is a self-hosted grocery list and recipe manager. The backend is made with Flask and the frontend with Flutter. Easily add items to your shopping list before you go shopping. You can also create recipes and add items based on what you want to cook.

Simple, Encrypted Budgets & Expenses. Take back control of your budgets and expenses in a simple way, achieve piece of mind, and maintain control of your data. This is the PWA/Web app for Budget Zen (frontend and backend / serverful).
